caption.title: Context-specific false-recent rate (FRR) against MDRI in three demonstrative surveillance scenarios.
caption.p: A: Scenario similar to South African epidemic. B: Scenario similar to Kenyan epidemic. C: Concentrated epidemic scenario. A supplementary viral load threshold of >1,000c/mL is used throughout. We assume ARV exposure testing classifies all treated individuals as long-term. This assumption is relaxed in S4 Fig.
